QuestionInfo: How is your mood right now? (Rate on a scale from 1 to 10)
How would you say your energy level is? (Rate on a scale from 1 to 10)
I feel upset because of small things easily. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
My energy level is____ compared to my usual energy level. (lower/same/higher)
I’m not enjoying things that I used to enjoy. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes – agree)
I’m constantly feeling down, depressed, or hopeless. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes – agree)
I often think about things that I that can harm me or people around me often. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
How many hours of sleep did you get last night? (Rate on a scale from less than 3 to 12+ hours)
I can’t control the responses of my body to unwanted situations. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
I can tell myself to focus when I want to. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
I have thought about ending my own life in the past week. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
I have thought about ways to harm myself in the past week. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes - agree)
I have harmed myself in the last month. (Yes or no)
I experience a variety of pain and aches. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes – agree)
I feel anxious over things and that’s affecting my normal life. (Rate on a scale of don’t agree – sometimes – agree)
